tool_description: Sends meeting invitations to attendees with calendar integration, manages RSVP tracking, and handles invitation updates.

attendee_emails.description: List of attendee email addresses to send invitations to

meeting_subject.description: Subject line for the meeting invitation

meeting_description.description: Detailed description of the meeting purpose and agenda

start_time.description: Meeting start time in ISO 8601 format

end_time.description: Meeting end time in ISO 8601 format

location.description: Meeting location or virtual meeting link

organizer_email.description: Email address of the meeting organizer

invitation_template.description: Template style for invitation (standard, formal, casual)

error_messages: Invalid attendee emails: One or more email addresses are not in valid format.
Too many attendees: Maximum 200 attendees allowed per invitation batch.
Invalid time range: start_time must be before end_time and in valid ISO 8601 format.
Missing subject: meeting_subject is required and cannot be empty.
Invalid organizer email: Organizer email address is not in valid format.
Invalid template: invitation_template must be one of standard, formal, casual.
Email delivery failed: Unable to send invitations to one or more recipients.
usage: Provide attendee list, meeting details, and time information. Optional settings include RSVP requirements and reminder preferences. Returns invitation sending status and tracking information.

invitation_id.description: Unique identifier for this invitation batch

failed_recipients.description: List of email addresses where invitation delivery failed
